invocations.description:
Sets the texture of id textureid as the background of the whole HUD. Possible values for sizemode are 0 (do not resize), 1 (resize without anti-aliasing) and 2 (resize with anti-aliasing). The left, top, right and bottom optional parameters are offsets of where the texture should start and end.
Note: If you do not wish this to take the whole screen, setfixedsize must be called on the HUD before this.
